text: Era jjukira bwe twakugamba nti mazima Mukama omulabiriziwo yeetoolodde abantu (abo, n'olwekyo tobatya) era tetwaleeta ndooto eyo gye twakulaga okugyako olw'okugezesa abantu era mu ngeri y'emu omuti ogwakolimirwa mu Kurâ€™ani nakyo kigezo era tubatiisa (nga tubabuulira) ebiribaawo ku lunaku lw'enkomerero naye tebibongera okugyako okubula okuyitirivu
